channel.title: AME High Podcast: Aviation Made Easy
channel.description: The AME High Podcast is the place for hanger talk with our hosts Mark Patey, world record pilot for fastest flight across the United States in single-engine aircraft, and AME HIGH's CFI Erika Wiggins.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2013 AME High. All rights reserved.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Aviation Made Easy
channel.itunes:summary: The AME HIGH Podcast is the place for hanger talk with our hosts Mark Patey, world record pilot for fastest flight across the United States in a single-engine aircraft, and AME HIGH's CFI Erika Wiggins
channel.itunes:author: AME HIGH

image.title: AME High Podcast: Aviation Made Easy

item.title: Aviation Humor!
item.dc:creator: amehigh
item.description:
This week on the AME High Podcast: Aviation Made Easy, Erika goes over the sayings and phrases that make a pilot smile and chuckle.  And is often the case with a good joke, there are some truths that help understand the life of an aviator.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ksboZ3MbfBk 

Send in your funnies to us!  Erika@AMEHigh.com

Like us on

item.title: Safe Summer Flying
item.dc:creator: amehigh
item.description:
Summer is here.  (At least for listeners in the northern hemisphere.)  While that means beaches, bikinis, and sunshine, it also means a new set of considerations to enable a pilot to safely fly the summer skies.

For instance, being mindful of hydration and the accompanying bathroom breaks.  You won’t believe where that conversation goes.

Plus, how to avoid thunderstorms and what to do if you get tangled in the middle of one.

N [...]
item.content:encoded:
Summer is here.  (At least for listeners in the northern hemisphere.)  While that means beaches, bikinis, and sunshine, it also means a new set of considerations to enable a pilot to safely fly the summer skies.

For instance, being mindful of hydration and the accompanying bathroom breaks.  You won’t believe where that conversation goes.

Plus, how to avoid thunderstorms and what to do if you get tangled in the middle of one.

Now, you can WATCH the AME High Podcast!  But if you prefer just the audio, it is still below.  Enjoy and thank you for listening!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JeNk2X4VdJY

Submit questions to next weeks show and watch it live on Wednesday, May 28th, at 11:00 MST.

Like us on   Follow us on

You won't believe where that conversation goes.Plus, how to avoid thunderstorms and what to do if you get tangled in the middle of one.Now, you can WATCH the AME High Podcast! But if you prefer just the audio, it is still below. item.title: Characters Found At An Airport
item.dc:creator: amehigh
item.description:
Erika and Keith attempt to identify the type of people found at all airports.

Are you Air Force guy?  Or “You are doing it wrong!” guy?
What characters did we miss?  Email Erika@AMEHigh.com

item.title: Pilot’s Responsibility to Keeping Up Currency
item.dc:creator: amehigh
item.description:
Erika jumps onto her CFI soapbox about pilot’s personal responsibility of keeping their currency. How do you keep your pilot certificate current? What’s your attitude toward currency? Are you trying to improve as a pilot? Do you keep your skill current? Do you take the easy road on your bi-annual flight review?

Tell Erika your advice and experience in keeping your currency by emailing her at Erika@amehigh.com

Like us on

item.title: Stallophobia | Overcoming the Fear of Stalls
item.dc:creator: amehigh
item.description: Stalls can be very uncomfortable for pilots.  How can a pilot get comfortable with stalls?  Erika Wiggins, AME High’s CFI will give you all of her tips and tricks to not only help you become comfortable with stalls, but how you can help others become pros at flying their airplane.
item.content:encoded: Stalls can be very uncomfortable for pilots.  How can a pilot get comfortable with stalls?  Erika Wiggins, AME High’s CFI will give you all of her tips and tricks to not only help you become comfortable with stalls, but how you can help others become pros at flying their airplane.

Erika Wiggins, AME High's CFI will give you all of her tips and tricks to not only help you become comfortable with stalls, but how you can help others become pros at flying their airplane.
item.itunes:author: AME HIGH

item.title: From Touchdown to Rescue | Emergency Preparedness
item.dc:creator: amehigh
item.description: Erika discusses the statistics that pilots should know concerning emergency rescue.  How long does it take search and rescue to find you if you’ve filed IFR? VFR? No Flight Plan filed?  What should you do when you land?
item.content:encoded: Erika discusses the statistics that pilots should know concerning emergency rescue.  How long does it take search and rescue to find you if you’ve filed IFR? VFR? No Flight Plan filed?  What should you do when you land?

item.title: Short Field Landings at St. Bart’s
item.dc:creator: amehigh
item.description:
Erika and Keith discuss the world of short field landings at St. Bart’s, and how Erika lived on a boat for 9 years!  Also, an announcement!  Plus, the NTSB report gets Erika to reveal why she is crazy… (hint: its flight students trying to kill her).

Are you or somebody you know ready to take ground school?  You can take the AME High: Aviation Made Easy course with our friends at Spectaculair Interactive!  When you get there type in “hangartalk14″ to get an additional 20% off!  Online, fun, dynamic, interactive ground school that you can take at your own pace.
item.content:encoded:
Erika and Keith discuss the world of short field landings at St. Bart’s, and how Erika lived on a boat for 9 years!  Also, an announcement!  Plus, the NTSB report gets Erika to reveal why she is crazy… (hint: its flight students trying to kill her).

Are you or somebody you know ready to take ground school?  You can take the AME High: Aviation Made Easy course with our friends at Spectaculair Interactive!  When you get there type in “hangartalk14″ to get an additional 20% off!  Online, fun, dynamic, interactive ground school that you can take at your own pace.

item.title: Digital Logbooks | Toréa Rodriguez - Log 10 Pro
item.dc:creator: amehigh
item.description:
Erika welcomes Toréa Rodriguez from Log 10 Pro to talk about the benefits of going with a digital logbook.  Erika hasn’t made the transition to a digital logbook yet, will she be convinced?

Get in touch with our guest on twitter @torea.  She is a great resource for any questions you may have.

Learn more about Log 10 Pro
item.content:encoded:
Erika welcomes Toréa Rodriguez from Log 10 Pro to talk about the benefits of going with a digital logbook.  Erika hasn’t made the transition to a digital logbook yet, will she be convinced?

Get in touch with our guest on twitter @torea.  She is a great resource for any questions you may have.

Learn more about Log 10 Pro @coradine or at www.coradine.com.

If you are or know somebody needing to take ground school you are in luck!  You can do so with our partners at Spectaculair Interactive, and when you do, you can get Log 10 Pro at a discount! Click the image below to check it out!

item.title: The $100 Hamburger | John Purner
item.dc:creator: amehigh
item.description:
Erika welcomes John Purner author of the terrific The $100 Hamburger book.  Listen to John detail the most popular general aviation restaurant.  The most decadent general aviation restaurant.  Plus, how a great airport restaurant is important.


This weeks NTSB report leads to a discussion on bird strikes.

Get in touch with Erika on twitter: @active_explorer or @ErikaFWiggins,  instagram:&n [...]
item.content:encoded:
Erika welcomes John Purner author of the terrific The $100 Hamburger book.  Listen to John detail the most popular general aviation restaurant.  The most decadent general aviation restaurant.  Plus, how a great airport restaurant is important.


This weeks NTSB report leads to a discussion on bird strikes.

Get in touch with Erika on twitter: @active_explorer or @ErikaFWiggins,  instagram: @active_explorer, like on Facebook.com/ActiveExplorer, and good old fashion email Erika@AMEHIGH.com.
